name: Joker
effect: +4 Mult

name: Greedy Joker
effect: Played cards with Diamond suit give +3 Mult when scored

name: Lusty Joker
effect: Played cards with Heart suit give +3 Mult when scored

name: Wrathful Joker
effect: Played cards with Spade suit give +3 Mult when scored

name: Gluttonous Joker
effect: Played cards with Club suit give +3 Mult when scored

name: Jolly Joker
effect: +8 Mult if played hand contains a Pair

name: Zany Joker
effect: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

name: Mad Joker
effect: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair

name: Crazy Joker
effect: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Straight

name: Droll Joker
effect: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Flush

name: Sly Joker
effect: +50 Chips if played hand contains a Pair

name: Wily Joker
effect: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

name: Clever Joker
effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Two Pair

name: Devious Joker
effect: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

name: Crafty Joker
effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Flush

name: Half Joker
effect: +20 Mult if played hand contains 3 or fewer cards

name: Joker Stencil
effect: X1 Mult for each empty Joker slot. Joker Stencil included

name: Four Fingers
effect: All Flushes and Straights can be made with 4 cards

name: Mime
effect: Retrigger all card held in hand abilities

name: Credit Card
effect: Go up to -$20 in debt

name: Ceremonial Dagger
effect: When Blind is selected, destroy Joker to the right and permanently add double its sell value to this Mult

name: Banner
effect: +30 Chips for each remaining discard

name: Mystic Summit
effect: +15 Mult when 0 discards remaining

name: Marble Joker
effect: Adds one Stone card to the deck when Blind is selected

name: Loyalty Card
effect: X4 Mult every 6 hands played5 remaining

name: 8 Ball
effect: 1 in 4 chance for each played 8 to create a Tarot card when scored(Must have room)

name: Misprint
effect: +0-23 Mult

name: Dusk
effect: Retrigger all played cards in final hand of the round

name: Raised Fist
effect: Adds double the rank of lowest ranked card held in hand to Mult

name: Chaos the Clown
effect: 1 free Reroll per shop

name: Fibonacci
effect: Each played Ace, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gives +8 Mult when scored

name: Steel Joker
effect: Gives X0.2 Mult for each Steel Card in your full deck
unlockRequirement: Available from start (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Steel Card in the deck)

name: Scary Face
effect: Played face cards give +30 Chips when scored

name: Abstract Joker
effect: +3 Mult for each Joker card

name: Delayed Gratification
effect: Earn $2 per discard if no discards are used by end of the round

name: Hack
effect: Retrigger each played 2, 3, 4, or 5

name: Pareidolia
effect: All cards are considered face cards

name: Gros Michel
effect: +15 Mult1 in 6 chance this is destroyed at the end of round

name: Even Steven
effect: Played cards with even rank give +4 Mult when scored (10, 8, 6, 4, 2)

name: Odd Todd
effect: Played cards with odd rank give +31 Chips when scored (A, 9, 7, 5, 3)

name: Scholar
effect: Played Aces give +20 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

name: Business Card
effect: Played face cards have a 1 in 2 chance to give $2 when scored

name: Supernova
effect: Adds the number of times poker hand has been played this run to Mult

name: Ride the Bus
effect: This Joker gains +1 Mult per consecutive hand played without a scoring face card

name: Space Joker
effect: 1 in 4 chance to upgrade level of played poker hand

name: Egg
effect: Gains $3 of sell value at end of round

name: Burglar
effect: When Blind is selected, gain +3 Hands and lose all discards

name: Blackboard
effect: X3 Mult if all cards held in hand are Spades or Clubs

name: Runner
effect: Gains +15 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

name: Ice Cream
effect: +100 Chips-5 Chips for every hand played

name: DNA
effect: If first hand of round has only 1 card, add a permanent copy to deck and draw it to hand

name: Splash
effect: Every played card counts in scoring

name: Blue Joker
effect: +2 Chips for each remaining card in deck

name: Sixth Sense
effect: If first hand of round is a single 6, destroy it and create a Spectral card (Must have room)

name: Constellation
effect: This Joker gains X0.1 Mult every time a Planet card is used

name: Hiker
effect: Every played card permanently gains +5 Chips when scored

name: Faceless Joker
effect: Earn $5 if 3 or more face cards are discarded at the same time

name: Green Joker
effect: +1 Mult per hand played -1 Mult per discard

name: Superposition
effect: Create a Tarot card if poker hand contains an Ace and a Straight (Must have room)

name: To Do List
effect: Earn $4 if poker hand is a [Poker Hand], poker hand changes at end of round

name: Cavendish
effect: X3 Mult 1 in 1000 chance this card is destroyed at the end of round
unlockRequirement: Available from start (Can only appear in the shop when Gros Michel has destroyed itself in the current run)

name: Card Sharp
effect: X3 Mult if played poker hand has already been played this round

name: Red Card
effect: This Joker gains +3 Mult when any Booster Pack is skipped

name: Madness
effect: When Small Blind or Big Blind is selected, gain X0.5 Mult and destroy a random Joker

name: Square Joker
effect: This Joker gains +4 Chips if played hand has exactly 4 cards

name: Séance
effect: If poker hand is a Straight Flush, create a random Spectral card (Must have room)

name: Riff-Raff
effect: When Blind is selected, create 2 Common Jokers (Must have room)

name: Vampire
effect: This Joker gains X0.1 Mult per scoring Enhanced card played, removes card Enhancement

name: Shortcut
effect: Allows Straights to be made with gaps of 1 rank (ex: 10 8 6 5 3)

name: Hologram
effect: This Joker gains X0.25 Mult every time a playing card is added to your deck

name: Vagabond
effect: Create a Tarot card if hand is played with $4 or less

name: Baron
effect: Each King held in hand gives X1.5 Mult

name: Cloud 9
effect: Earn $1 for each 9 in your full deck at end of round

name: Rocket
effect: Earn $1 at end of round. Payout increases by $2 when Boss Blind is defeated

name: Obelisk
effect: This Joker gains X0.2 Mult per consecutive hand played without playing your most played poker hand

name: Midas Mask
effect: All played face cards become Gold cards when scored

name: Luchador
effect: Sell this card to disable the current Boss Blind

name: Photograph
effect: First played face card gives X2 Mult when scored

name: Gift Card
effect: Add $1 of sell value to every Joker and Consumable card at end of round

name: Turtle Bean
effect: +5 hand size, reduces by 1 each round

name: Erosion
effect: +4 Mult for each card below [the deck's starting size] in your full deck

name: Reserved Parking
effect: Each face card held in hand has a 1 in 2 chance to give $1

name: Mail-In Rebate
effect: Earn $5 for each discarded [rank], rank changes every round

name: To the Moon
effect: Earn an extra $1 of interest for every $5 you have at end of round

name: Hallucination
effect: 1 in 2 chance to create a Tarot card when any Booster Pack is opened (Must have room)

name: Fortune Teller
effect: +1 Mult per Tarot card used this run

name: Juggler
effect: +1 hand size

name: Drunkard
effect: +1 discard each round

name: Stone Joker
effect: Gives +25 Chips for each Stone Card in your full deck
unlockRequirement: Available from start (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Stone Card in the deck)

name: Golden Joker
effect: Earn $4 at end of round

name: Lucky Cat
effect: This Joker gains X0.25 Mult every time a Lucky card successfully triggers
unlockRequirement: Available from start (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Lucky Card in the deck)

name: Baseball Card
effect: Uncommon Jokers each give X1.5 Mult

name: Bull
effect: +2 Chips for each $1 you have

name: Diet Cola
effect: Sell this card to create a free Double Tag

name: Trading Card
effect: If first discard of round has only 1 card, destroy it and earn $3

name: Flash Card
effect: This Joker gains +2 Mult per reroll in the shop

name: Popcorn
effect: +20 Mult -4 Mult per round played

name: Spare Trousers
effect: This Joker gains +2 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair

name: Ancient Joker
effect: Each played card with [suit] gives X1.5 Mult when scored, suit changes at end of round

name: Ramen
effect: X2 Mult, loses X0.01 Mult per card discarded

name: Walkie Talkie
effect: Each played 10 or 4 gives +10 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

name: Seltzer
effect: Retrigger all cards played for the next 10 hands

name: Castle
effect: This Joker gains +3 Chips per discarded [suit] card, suit changes every round

name: Smiley Face
effect: Played face cards give +5 Mult when scored

name: Campfire
effect: This Joker gains X0.25 Mult for each card sold, resets when Boss Blind is defeated

name: Golden Ticket
effect: Played Gold cards earn $4 when scored
unlockRequirement: Play a 5 card hand that contains only Gold cards (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Gold Card in the deck)

name: Mr. Bones
effect: Prevents Death if chips scored are at least 25% of required chips self destructs

name: Acrobat
effect: X3 Mult on final hand of round

name: Sock and Buskin
effect: Retrigger all played face cards
unlockRequirement: Play 300 face cards across all runs

name: Swashbuckler
effect: Adds the sell value of all other owned Jokers to Mult

name: Troubadour
effect: +2 hand size, -1 hand per round
unlockRequirement: Win 5 consecutive rounds by playing only a single hand in each (Discards are fine)

name: Certificate
effect: When round begins, add a random playing card with a random seal to your hand
unlockRequirement: Have a Gold card with a Gold Seal

name: Smeared Joker
effect: Hearts and Diamonds count as the same suit, Spades and Clubs count as the same suit
unlockRequirement: Have 3 or more Wild Cards in your deck

name: Throwback
effect: X0.25 Mult for each Blind skipped this run
unlockRequirement: Continue a run from the Main Menu

name: Hanging Chad
effect: Retrigger first played card used in scoring 2 additional times
unlockRequirement: Beat a Boss Blind with a High Card hand

name: Rough Gem
effect: Played cards with Diamond suit earn $1 when scored
unlockRequirement: Have at least 30 Diamonds in your deck

name: Bloodstone
effect: 1 in 2 chance for played cards with Heart suit to give X1.5 Mult when scored
unlockRequirement: Have at least 30 Hearts in your deck

name: Arrowhead
effect: Played cards with Spade suit give +50 Chips when scored
unlockRequirement: Have at least 30 Spades in your deck

name: Onyx Agate
effect: Played cards with Club suit give +7 Mult when scored
unlockRequirement: Have at least 30 Clubs in your deck

name: Glass Joker
effect: This Joker gains X0.75 Mult for every Glass Card that is destroyed
unlockRequirement: Have 5 or more Glass cards in your deck (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Glass Card in the deck)

name: Showman
effect: Joker, Tarot, Planet, and Spectral cards may appear multiple times

name: Flower Pot
effect: X3 Mult if poker hand contains a Diamond card, Club card, Heart card, and Spade card

name: Blueprint
effect: Copies ability of Joker to the right

name: Wee Joker
effect: This Joker gains +8 Chips when each played 2 is scored
unlockRequirement: Win a run in 18 or fewer rounds

name: Merry Andy
effect: +3 discards each round, -1 hand size
unlockRequirement: Win a run in 12 or fewer rounds

name: Oops! All 6s
effect: Doubles all listed probabilities (ex: 1 in 3 -> 2 in 3)
unlockRequirement: Earn at least 10,000 Chips in a single hand

name: The Idol
effect: Each played [rank] of [suit] gives X2 Mult when scoredCard changes every round
unlockRequirement: In one hand, earn at least 1,000,000 Chips

name: Seeing Double
effect: X2 Mult if played hand has a scoring Club card and a scoring card of any other suit
unlockRequirement: Play a hand that contains four 7 of Clubs. Other suits that count as clubs (e.g. wild suits) with rank 7 will also count

name: Matador
effect: Earn $8 if played hand triggers the Boss Blind ability
unlockRequirement: Defeat a Boss Blind in one hand, without using discards

name: Hit the Road
effect: This Joker gains X0.5 Mult for every Jack discarded this round
unlockRequirement: Discard 5 Jacks at the same time

name: The Duo
effect: X2 Mult if played hand contains a Pair
unlockRequirement: Win a run without playing a Pair

name: The Trio
effect: X3 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind
unlockRequirement: Win a run without playing a Three of a Kind

name: The Family
effect: X4 Mult if played hand contains a Four of a Kind
unlockRequirement: Win a run without playing a Four of a Kind

name: The Order
effect: X3 Mult if played hand contains a Straight
unlockRequirement: Win a run without playing a Straight

name: The Tribe
effect: X2 Mult if played hand contains a Flush
unlockRequirement: Win a run without playing a Flush

name: Stuntman
effect: +250 Chips,-2 hand size
unlockRequirement: Earn at least 100 million (100,000,000) Chips in a single hand

name: Invisible Joker
effect: After 2 rounds, sell this card to Duplicate a random Joker (Removes Negative from copy)
unlockRequirement: Win a game while never having more than 4 jokers

name: Brainstorm
effect: Copies the ability of leftmost Joker

name: Satellite
effect: Earn $1 at end of round per unique Planet card used this run

name: Shoot the Moon
effect: Each Queen held in hand gives +13 Mult
unlockRequirement: Play every Heart card in your deck in one round

name: Driver's License
effect: X3 Mult if you have at least 16 Enhanced cards in your full deck

name: Cartomancer
effect: Create a Tarot card when Blind is selected (Must have room)

name: Astronomer
effect: All Planet cards and Celestial Packs in the shop are free

name: Burnt Joker
effect: Upgrade the level of the first discarded poker hand each round

name: Bootstraps
effect: +2 Mult for every $5 you have
unlockRequirement: Have at least 2 Polychrome Jokers at the same time

name: Canio
effect: This Joker gains X1 Mult when a face card is destroyed
unlockRequirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card

name: Triboulet
effect: Played Kings and Queens each give X2 Mult when scored
unlockRequirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card

name: Yorick
effect: This Joker gains X1 Mult every 23 cards discarded
unlockRequirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card

name: Chicot
effect: Disables effect of every Boss Blind
unlockRequirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card

name: Perkeo
